pull.title: Don't use pass by reference to const for cheaply-copied types (bool, char, etc.)
pull.body: Don't use pass by reference to const for cheaply-copied types (`bool`, `char`, etc.).

events.body: Was `memusage.h` ignored on purpose? Otherwise ACK.

events.message: Don't use pass by reference to const for cheaply-copied types (bool, char, etc.).

rename.from: Don't use pass by reference to const for cheaply-copied types (bool, char, etc.).
rename.to: Don't use pass by reference to const for cheaply-copied types (bool, char, etc.)

comments.body: Might as well do it for nMaximumCount as well - copying a 64-bit integer is gonna be faster than pass-by-reference, probably.
